definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: The chancellor, Alistair Darling, admitted yesterday that the recession was deeper than the government had expected.
sentences.chinese: 财相戴理德昨天承认经济衰退比政府预料的要严峻。

sentences.english: In February, Nakagawa resigned as finance minister in disgrace after appearing drunk at a news conference.
sentences.chinese: 中川昭一2月因在新闻会上露醉态而辞去财相职务。

definition: prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)
ASŌ Tarō (1940-), Japanese entrepreneur and LDP politician, prime minister from 2008
Abe Shinzo (1954-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2006-2007 and from 2012
Foreign Secretary/(UK) Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
